article: the man who fired his rifle into president hamid unk 's car , missing the president by just centimeters -lrb- inches -rrb- and grazing the kandahar governor , had been hired as a security guard just four days earlier , an official said friday .
abstract: investigators probe foiled attempt to kill karzai ; would-be assassin a new recruit to governor 's security staff
